source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.
source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup

items.title: Haircuts at Home: Gentleman's Cut
items.headline: Learn hair cutting and hair styling techniques at home
objectives_summary: Confidently cut your kids hair at home

items.title: Basic makeup artistry: master 12 most-used techniques
items.headline: A structured and complete guide for beginners to learn how to professionally apply make-up on themselves or others
objectives_summary: Take your first steps to becoming a makeup artist. Learn how to correctly apply make-up on yourself and others, regardless of challenges such as skin age/type, eye shape and so on.

items.title: BB Glow professional or at home treatment
items.headline: Beginner Course, perform BB Glow treatments on yourself or your clients, step by step
objectives_summary: BB Glow treatment step by step
Products and serum used during the treatment
About the electric device and needles

items.title: Level one Aromatherapy
items.headline: Natural health and well-being with Aromatherapy essential oils,
objectives_summary: Students who have completed 'A taste of Aromatherapy' will continue to build their knowledge basis that underpins the practice of Aromatherapy.
Students will learn what Aromatherapists do, they will develop a broader understanding of the history of aromatherapy
Students will learn more about health, safety and security of essential aromatic oils, including more information about babies, toddlers and children.

items.title: Lash Lift & Brow Lamination, for Beginners, 3 Human Models
items.headline: Learn the complete steps for Lash (Lift) Lamination and Brow Lamination, all in one course (updated)
objectives_summary: Brow Lamination/ Tint/ Shape
Eyelash Lamination/ Lift/ Curl/ Tint/ Botox
Tools and Products

items.title: The Art of Great Wedding Makeup and Hair

visible_instructors.title: Academy of Film Fashion and Design
visible_instructors.name: Academy of Film
visible_instructors.display_name: Academy of Film Fashion and Design

items.headline: A Guide to a Complete Look for Bridal Makeup
objectives_summary: The Student will learn everything from skin prep to false lashes.
The course includes Eyeshadow, brow, contour and correcting techniques.
The student will also learn how to create the perfect style for wedding season, style of wedding & venue.

items.title: Masterclass for Artisan Skincare Entrepreneurs
items.headline: Create and Launch your own Retail-Ready Natural Skincare Brand
objectives_summary: Learn how to create 21 of our best-selling, retail-ready skincare recipes
Learn how to create waterless recipes and preservative-free recipes
Learn about raw and vegan ingredients knowledge

items.title: Certificate in Intimate Skin Bleaching
items.headline: For licensed Aestheticians
objectives_summary: Female and Male Anatomy
Safety and Prevention of STDs and HIV
Consultation and Contract

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Performing a Dermaplaning Facial
items.headline: Create a glowing, radiant complexion for your clients
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to perform a full Dermaplaning routine. They will also learn what Dermaplaning is, how it works, contraindications that would prevent the treatment being performed, what tools and products to use and an example consultation form.

items.title: The Ultimate Beginners Guide to Skincare
items.headline: The fundamentals you need to know when working with skin
objectives_summary: Popular Skincare Ingredients
The importance of the skin barrier
Skin types & how to treat them

items.title: Start a Perfume Business - A Basic Guide
items.headline: A basic guide to mixing inspired and natural perfumes
objectives_summary: Blending inspired fragrances
Creating Essential Oil Perfumes
Creating your own perfume blend

items.title: Learn about Classic and Volume Eyelash Extensions
items.headline: Beginner Classic, Hybrid and Volume Eyelash Extensions Course
objectives_summary: How to Apply Classic Eyelash Extensions
Eye Anatomy for Eyelash Extensions
Lash Structure, Growth and its Lash Growth cycle

items.title: Hair Braiding Course for Beginners - Learn 7 Basic Braids
items.headline: This course will help you get started by learning the fundamental techniques - Its a mini version of our FULL course!
objectives_summary: Braiding Hair for Absolute Beginners
Rope braids, Fishtails, French Braids, Dutch Braid, 4-Strand, 5-strand, Infinity Braids, Pull through braids and more!

items.title: Become a Professional Makeup Artist for Film and Television

visible_instructors.title: Academy of Film Fashion and Design
visible_instructors.name: Academy of Film
visible_instructors.display_name: Academy of Film Fashion and Design

items.headline: How to techniques” as well as the business concepts you need to become a successful makeup artist.
objectives_summary: Professionally apply makeup in for the film and TV industry
This course goes over the makeup involved and how to apply the makeup in the way of a professional makeup artist.

items.title: Secrets to Perfect Skin - Anti Age and Blemish Free Skincare
items.headline: A great skincare routine should prevent spots & wrinkles. Learn simple, cheap & quick techniques for beautiful skin
objectives_summary: Apply skincare products correctly and transform your skin
Learn tips and tricks to avoid unnecessary money and time on skincare
Develop beautiful spot free and youthful skin

items.title: Classic & Volume Eyelash Extensions
items.headline: How to apply classic and volume lashes
objectives_summary: How to apply classic & volume lashes
